duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide engineering plans, in-depth analyses, tools, and improvements to field operations.
Lead department projects and participate in cross-functional projects by identifying process improvements and enhancements.
Analyzes performance data within engineering and documents existing processes.
Researches and analyzes technical or engineering related information independently and presents improvement recommendations to management.
Mentors and develops critical skill sets in lower level engineers and updates engineering plans based on forecasted volume and historical data.
Prepares cost benefit analysis independently for technology improvements and monitors staffing plan to meet productivity goals.
Leads operations and Corporate Engineering department projects and participates in cross-functional QDM projects.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering and 4+ years of relevant experience. In lieu of degree, high school diploma or GED and 6+ years of relevant experience.
